name: Mad Monkey East Side
description:
Step into our awesome courtyard space, the perfect spot to relax, connect, and soak up the Sydney sun and enjoy one of our legendary courtyard parties. 

Welcome to Mad Monkey East Side, perfectly located in the beating heart of Sydney's vibrant Kings Cross! As a proud part of the famous Mad Monkey Backpackers Group, we're all about bringing travellers together and creating unforgettable Sydney adventures as part of our extended Mad Monkey Family.
Our hostel perfectly blends chilled-out comfort with a lively party atmosphere, making it the ideal place to meet and socialise with fellow adventurers. Our spacious rooms provide a comfortable retreat  and you'll love the convenience of a power point and bed light at each bed – perfect for charging your devices and reading in comfort.

We're big on fun and connection! Our dedicated team hosts big events regularly, ensuring there's always something exciting happening to keep the good times rolling. Plus, kickstart your day right with a barista coffee on the house available at the Happy Travels shop!

Here's what you'll enjoy with every stay, all included in your room rate:
- Ultrafast WiFi
- Large Security Lockers (BYO padlocks)
- Complimentary Tea & Coffee
- TV Room & Awesome Courtyard
- Organised Social Events 7 Days a week
- Power Point & Bed Light at Each Bed
- Big Organised Events
- Free Barista Coffee (at Happy Travels)

You'll love our unbeatable location, right in the midst of Kings Cross with countless bars, restaurants, and cafes all around. Iconic Sydney landmarks like the Opera House and Harbour Bridge are within walking distance, and the hostel is only a short stroll from Rushcutters Bay Park, a fantastic spot to relax and take in stunning harbour views. With the train station just a 2-minute walk away, guests are sure to make the absolute most of this beautiful city!

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception hours are 8 am - 8 pm. If you're checking in after these hours, please give us a call beforehand.
- Check-out is before 10 am and check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property. While all adults are welcome, dorm rooms are recommended for guests aged 18 to 35.
- A valid passport or international passport is needed for check-in.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- Please note: No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

Join us at Mad Monkey East side – your gateway to an amazing Sydney adventure with new friends!

houseRules.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: 
Guest will be able to check-in during Front Desk opening hours from 14.00 to 20:00, after reception trading hours the night manager on duty will check guests in until 2am, their mobile number will be provided on arrival date.

We are a strictly 18+ property.
Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35. We would advise booking a private room (where available) if outside of this age range for your own comfort.

A valid passport is required for check-in.

* 1% surcharge on all credit card payments

*CHECK IN: 2PM
*CHECK OUT: 10AM
*NO OUTSIDE GUESTS After 22:00


Reception Hours: 8am-8pm. We have a night manager on duty outside of these hours Please call us upon arrival at the hostel if you need to check in outside these hours. A valid foreign passport is required by all guests upon check in. 

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
